## dlmpr is an r package for simulating dynamic landscape meta-population models.

The package aims to develop a dynamic landscape meta-population models in R using a modular framework. 

```{r install, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github('skiptoniam/dlmpr')
library(dlmpr)
```

Because we are interested in matrix population models (or stage based models) we have develop a matrix population model for a single population.

```{r single pop}
tmat <- as.trans_matrix(matrix(c(.53,0,.42,0.1,0.77,0,0,0.12,0.9),nrow = 3,ncol = 3,byrow = TRUE))
matsd <- tmat/10
v0 <- c(80,20,0)
sim_t10_rep100 <- demographic_mod(v0=v0,tmat=tmat,matsd=matsd,estdem=TRUE,time=10,nrep=100) 
plot(sim_t10_rep100)
```
